thread.title: Jordan Peele Breaks Out Obama Impression To Imagine How He's Reacting to Trump | The Daily Dot
thread.title_full: Jordan Peele Breaks Out Obama Impression To Imagine How He's Reacting to Trump | The Daily Dot

author: Michelle Jaworski
title: Jordan Peele Breaks Out Obama Impression To Imagine How He's Reacting to Trump | The Daily Dot
text:
Screengrab via Late Night with Seth Meyers/YouTube BTW 
Jordan Peele brought back his Barack Obama impression to capture what the former president might be thinking of what’s happening in the country right now. 
While chatting about the end of Key and Peele along with his Obama impression, he and Seth Meyers started imagining how Obama, who’s been on vacation for much of President Trump’s time in office , would react to everything. 
He’s used social media sparingly, and aside from condemning Trump’s immigration ban last month, hasn’t said much at all. But Peele has some idea of how Obama, with whiskey in hand, would react while watching the news. 
Like the last time we saw Obama and his anger translator , it’s unexpected but most welcome. He doesn’t even need an anger translator this time.
